channel.title: apps on PostDoc Problems
channel.description: Recent content in apps on PostDoc Problems

item.title: Order
item.description: I have always loved chaos. But sadly, I find myself surrounded by too much of it. With the tables turned, I find myself trying to find order in these chaotic times. Here’s what has helped me so far: OneNote Nebo on iPad + iPencil for keeping a daily journal Joplin for organizing notes Goodnotes for math Ticktick Google Keep for making daily checklists A very convenient Pomodoro timer Zoom meetings with friends and family Duolingo to keep myself busy Work I really hope when this crisis ends (which I know is never) I can get back to complaining about too much order and wanting more chaos and anarchy.
